greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=1, a(2)=3; for n>1, a(n+2)=(a(n+1)+a(n))/3 if (a(n+1)+a(n)==0 (mod 3)); a(n+2)=(a(n+1)+a(n))/2 if (a(n+1)+a(n)==0 (mod 2)); and a(n+2)=a(n+1)+a(n) otherwise.
comment: A Collatz-Fibonacci mixture. Does this sequence diverge to infinity?
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Apr 11 2002
